########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND DRM_sources
    #c_encoder_interp_impl.cc
    c_encoder_impl.cc
    QAM4_Mapper_impl.cc
    QAM16_Mapper_impl.cc
    Cell_Interleaver_impl.cc
    Cell_Interleaver2_impl.cc
    PRBS_Dispersal_impl.cc
    FAC_Source_impl.cc
    SDC_Source_impl.cc
    IFFT_impl.cc
    Cyclic_Prefix_Add_impl.cc
    To_complex_impl.cc
    Cyclic_Prefix_Remove_impl.cc
    FFT_impl.cc
    Write_To_File_impl.cc
    RM_Zeroes_impl.cc
    QAM4_Demapper_impl.cc
    Write_To_File_Int_impl.cc
    Write_To_File_Float_impl.cc
    Cyclic_Prefix_Add_v2_impl.cc
    QAM16_Demapper_impl.cc
    Spectral_Efficiency_impl.cc )

set(DRM_sources "${DRM_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT DRM_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT DRM_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-DRM SHARED ${DRM_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-DRM gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-DRM
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-DRM PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_DRM_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-DRM PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-DRM)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_DRM_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-DRM)

if(NOT test_DRM_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_DRM_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_DRM_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("DRM_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
